<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;data&#95;begin&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">/// emitAssembly - Print the frametable. The ocaml frametable format is thus:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">///   extern &quot;C&quot; struct align(sizeof(intptr&#95;t)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///     uint16&#95;t NumDescriptors;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///     struct align(sizeof(intptr&#95;t)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">///       void &#42;ReturnAddress;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///       uint16&#95;t FrameSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///       uint16&#95;t NumLiveOffsets;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">///       uint16&#95;t LiveOffsets&#91;NumLiveOffsets&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &#125; Descriptors&#91;NumDescriptors&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#125; caml$&#123;module&#125;&#95;&#95;frametable;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that this precludes programs from stack frames larger than 64K</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (FrameSize and LiveOffsets would overflow). FrameTablePrinter will abort if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// either condition is detected in a function which uses the GC.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ocamlgcprinter-cpp-/ocamlgcmetadataprinter/#a6abb5b979094dd3eba1a0375a96e365a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ocamlgcprinter-cpp-/ocamlgcmetadataprinter/#a6abb5b979094dd3eba1a0375a96e365a">OcamlGCMetadataPrinter::finishAssembly</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmoduleinfo">GCModuleInfo</a> &amp;Info,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmetadataprinter/#a47b1796e5c0a56e8a36cf39ae2d051a5">AsmPrinter</a> &amp;AP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IntPtrSize = M.getDataLayout().getPointerSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;switchSection(AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a0580b05cc0794957d4ac1ce2f209ac87">getObjFileLowering</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#af1e49c4350a67d9c442c39ab1dc211eb">getTextSection</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;code&#95;end&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ac189a157a6aab76ea837c13ec615dbc9">OutStreamer</a>-&gt;switchSection(AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#a0580b05cc0794957d4ac1ce2f209ac87">getObjFileLowering</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#afd9ae84447d7be72e18fd897b3f036d2">getDataSection</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#aa776a466c28ef5250df0206206360b8c">EmitCamlGlobal</a>(M, AP, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;data&#95;end&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDescriptors = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;GCFunctionInfo&gt; &amp;FI :</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">llvm::make&#95;range</a>(Info.funcinfo&#95;begin(), Info.funcinfo&#95;end())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FI-&gt;getStrategy().getName() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcmetadataprinter/#a103ca212831edb585c5fdc509df54b33">getStrategy</a>().<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/objcarc/provenanceanalysisevaluator-cpp/#a2ee79648e8bce3ddbb26358ff10e3e82">getName</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this function is managed by some other GC</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumDescriptors += FI-&gt;size();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Very rude!</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
